results.title: Effect of linagliptin on glucose metabolism and pancreatic beta cell function in patients with persistent prediabetes after metformin and lifestyle
results.text_hl: The goal of the study was to evaluate the effect of adding @CHEMICAL_Linagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069476 @@@linagliptin@@@ to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and lifestyle on @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ levels and pancreatic beta-cell function in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with persistent @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired glucose tolerance@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@IGT@@@) after 12 months of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and lifestyle.

results.title: Effect of Exercise Versus Metformin among Nigerians with Prediabetes: A Randomised Controlled Trial.
results.text_hl: However, moderate exercise and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have comparable efficacy in improving @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@glucose tolerance@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ risk reduction.

results.title: Effects of metformin on serum miRNA expression and target gene regulation in prediabetic patients.
